page.title: 03Leisure Patterns in Horwich
page.content:
The holiday pattern in the Horwich area is quite varied with people taking their holidays both at home in the British Isles and abroad. A very small number of people do not take any holday and will remain at home. The majority of people take their holidays during the Bolton or Horwich local holiday times known as{WAKES WEEKS.}
About half of the people in the community take part in a sport. Many attend the local{Leisure Centre.}This caters for a varity of sports which include swimming, badminton, squash, tabletennis and soccer to name a few. Membership to the Leisure Centre can be obtained. Although most people make use of the centre or use the local parks there are few who are members of clubs or societies.
